title: Cancer cell membrane-coated nanoparticles: a promising anti-tumor bionic platform
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10608-10637
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01026D, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Qiuyan Guo, Shengmei Wang, Rubing Xu, Yingnan Tang, Xinhua Xia
This review summarized the function of cancer cell membranes and comprehensively discussed the preparation of cancer cell membrane-coated nanoparticles (CCM-NPs) and their application in anti-tumor therapy.
